body:
Since spack no longer offers NWChem 6.6, there is no need of the patch lines.
On top of this, the patches are serviced out of nwchem-sw.org, a website that has been bought by cyber-squatters. If needed, I can upload the patches to https://nwchemgit.github.io
title: patches no longer needed since 6.6 is no longer offered
